summary: Verified Sentry webhook database storage. Found only 1 test error in database. Updated webhook handler to better parse Sentry's webhook payload structure (handling issue.created, issue.updated events, and different payload formats). Added detailed logging to track webhook reception. Backend server restarted with improved webhook handling.
current_status: Sentry webhook endpoint functional at /api/sentry/webhook. Database has 1 test error. Webhook handler updated to handle Sentry's actual payload formats. Need to verify Sentry is sending webhooks when new errors occur - check Alert Rules in Sentry dashboard.
